chinese: 所以你的计划是什么, Dean?
english: So what's your plan, Dean?

chinese: 我的意思是, 在你实习结束后?
english: I mean, after your internship?

chinese: 我完成学业.
english: I finish school.

chinese: 完成学业后, 我寻找一份工作.
english: After school, I look for a job.

chinese: 以你的资历,
english: With your qualifications,

chinese: 你不会有什么大问题的.
english: you won't have much of a problem.

chinese: 我希望那是真的.
english: I wish that were true.

chinese: 很多有资格的人找不到工作.
english: Lots of qualified people can't get work.

chinese: 因为企业雇不起人吗?
english: Because businesses can't afford to hire people?

chinese: 那是他们所说的.
english: That's what they say.

chinese: 尤其带上福利.
english: Especially with benefits.

chinese: 所以我可能不会得到一份工作  很长一段时间里.
english: So I may not get a job for a long time.

chinese: 如果我不能得到一份工作.
english: And if I can't get a job,

chinese: 失业率必定是过高了.
english: unemployment must be too high.

chinese: 当然, 我仍然必须还清我的学生贷款.
english: Of course, I still have to pay off my student loans.

chinese: 你必须自己支付大学的费用吗?
english: You have to pay for university yourself?

chinese: 政府不给你补贴吗?
english: Doesn't the government subsidize you?

chinese: 不多. 你大多得靠自己.
english: Not much. You're pretty much on your own.

chinese: 多有趣啊 报纸头条开始影响你的生活了.
english: Funny how the newspaper headlines start to affect your life.

chinese: 失业, 通货膨胀...
english: Unemployment, inflation....

chinese: Well 那不是很令人愉快, 是吗?
english: Well that's not very cheerful, is it?

chinese: 要是体育版更好一些该多好!
english: If only the sports pages were better!
